Top-3 Scripts:
au_968464: sudo ip route add 10.0.0.0/8 dev ppp0 metric 25

#!/bin/sh

if [ "$IFACE" = "ppp0" ]; then
     ifmetric enp4s0 1
     ip route add 10.0.0.0/8 dev ppp0 metric 25
fi
